  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:ait.opetaja.ee:c7f7405a315854979ac586d259cf12b0f39d203f</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>1</catalog>
            <entry>c7f7405a315854979ac586d259cf12b0f39d203f</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="et">Nimisõna, kes? mis?, 3. klassile</string>
            <string language="en">What and Who</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was und wer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce qui et qui</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que e quem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa e chi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι και ποιοι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Qué y quién</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="et">Õpilasele tööleht. Tunni eesmärk: Küsimuste esitamine inimeste, loomade ja esemete kohta Kes? Mis? Mõisted elus ja eluta. Nimisõna leidmine. 3. klass, I kooliaste</string>
            <string language="en">Student worksheet. The aim of the lesson: asking questions about people, animals and things. Who? What? Notions: alive and not alive. Finding a noun. Form 3, 1st stage of study.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="et">Algõpetus</string>
            <string language="et">Eesti keel</string>
            <string language="et">sõnaliigid</string>
            <string language="en">Basic School</string>
            <string language="en">Estonian language</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmerbogen. Das Ziel der Lektion: 
Stellen von von Fragen über Leute, Tiere und Sachen. Wer?
Was? Begriffe: lebendig und nicht lebendig. 
Finden eines Gegenstandswortes. Formular 3, 1. Stadium der
Studie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau d'étudiant. Le but de la leçon : 
poser des questions sur des personnes, des animaux et des 
choses. Qui ? Ce qui ? Notions : vivant et non
vivant. Conclusion d'un nom. Forme 3, 1ère étape 
d'étude.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha do estudante. O alvo da lição: 
fazendo perguntas sobre povos, animais e coisas. Quem? 
Que? Noções: vivo e nao vivo. Encontrando um
substantivo. Formulário 3, 1o estágio do estudo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro dell'allievo. Lo scopo 
della lezione: facendo le domande riguardo alla gente, agli 
animali ed alle cose. Chi? Che cosa? Nozioni: 
vivo e non vivo. Individuazione del nome. Forma 3, 
prima fase dello studio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας σπουδαστών. Ο στόχος του 
μαθήματος: ερώτημα των ερωτήσεων για τους ανθρώπους, τα ζώα
και τα πράγματα. Ποιοι; Τι; Έννοιες: 
ζωντανός και μη ζωντανός. Εύρεση ενός ουσιαστικού. 
Μορφή 3, 1$ο στάδιο της μελέτης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hoja de trabajo del estudiante. La 
puntería de la lección: hacer preguntas acerca de la gente, de
animales y de cosas. ¿Quién? ¿Qué? Nociones: 
vivo y no vivo. Encontrar un sustantivo. Forma 3, 
1ra etapa del estudio.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundlegende Schule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Estnische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">École de base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Langage estonien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escola Básica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Língua estonian</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scuola Di base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingua estone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βασικό σχολείο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εσθονική γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Escuela Básica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lenguaje estonio</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
